title: tryharded ranked this season, not happ
body:
just did promos
this is my first ever promo game where someone afkd
everything was going well in the early game, 8 kill lead, was popping off
then sona afkd after dying 3 times in a row
we lost the whole game because of her
and it counted as a loss
finished the game was a a+ am very happy
now im going 0/1 in promos
thanks riot
edit: also i love the new placement system because you can get coinflip carried in your first place then proceed to go on a 30 game losing streak and still be bronze 1 its really fun
